CustomField.description: Separator to be used together with Action Type: CONCATENATE Leading and trailing spaces will be removed so use word "space" if they are needed. Example: space|space will be interpreted as ' | ' (single quotes used to show leading/trailing spaces)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Separator to be used together with Action Type: CONCATENATE Leading and trailing spaces will be removed so use word "space" if they are needed. Example: space|space will be interpreted as ' | ' (single quotes used to show leading/trailing spaces)
CustomField.label: Separator
